About me

As a passionate and skilled front-end developer, I specialize in creating dynamic and responsive web applications that deliver exceptional user experiences. With a strong foundation in HTML, CSS, and JavaScript, complemented by expertise in modern frameworks like React, I bring innovative solutions to life. My commitment to clean, efficient code and a keen eye for design ensure that every project I undertake meets the highest standards of quality. I thrive in collaborative environments, consistently contributing to team success with my technical acumen and problem-solving abilities.

Outside of work, I enjoy web surfing, photography, and sketching. My goals include becoming a leading expert in front-end development and contributing to impactful projects. I am dedicated to making a positive difference through technology.

Projects

E-commerce Website

Developed a fully functional e-commerce website featuring a user-friendly interface, and a robust product management system. Utilized HTML, CSS, and JavaScript to create a seamless shopping experience with responsive design and efficient performance. The project demonstrates my ability to handle front-end development and deliver a polished, professional web application.

Spotify Clone

Developed a Spotify clone that mimics the core functionality of the popular music streaming service. Utilized HTML, CSS, and JavaScript to create a sleek, responsive user interface that allows users to browse and play songs, and control playback. Implemented features such as audio player controls. This project demonstrates my ability to replicate complex web applications and enhance user experience through interactive design and functionality.

INFOSHALA

Developed a fully functional Website “INFOSHALA” , which provides a solution for educational institutions as well as students to streamline the communication between them, using HTML , CSS and JAVASCRIPT.
